job description:
Coordinates, compiles and interprets information from multiple data systems regarding health care services, departmental productivity, and costs in an effort to ensure efficient departmental and network management and the provision of high quality health care services. The financial analyst provides decision support and data to ARMA’s network operations council (NOC), executive and management team and practice operations councils (POC’s). Assists revenue cycle and ARMA leadership in front-end operations.

Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s Degree Required.
  • 2-3 years in a financial position within a healthcare setting.

About Us
